BEFORE

$ ruby before_and_after_collection_optimization.rb 
  0.430000   0.090000   0.520000 (  0.783603)
  0.490000   0.100000   0.590000 (  0.656625)
  0.530000   0.100000   0.630000 (  0.678053)
  0.680000   0.110000   0.790000 (  1.067590)

AFTER

$ ruby before_and_after_collection_optimization.rb 
  0.410000   0.100000   0.510000 (  0.522396)
  0.470000   0.100000   0.570000 (  0.583256)
  0.510000   0.090000   0.600000 (  0.652063)
  0.630000   0.110000   0.740000 (  0.734668)
